name: dita-trajectory-visualization
description: Trajectory visualization using the Leaflet map library.
author: Zeyuan Shang(zeyuanxy@gmail.com), Mitchell Yuwono (Maintainer), Tom Grant <tgrant@volumeintegration.com> (http://volumeintegration.com)

scripts.prepare: jq '{ type: .helium.type, name: .name, description: .description, artifact: (.name + "@"+ .version), license: .license, icon: .helium.icon}' package.json > dita-trajectory-visualization.json
scripts.helium.dev: jq --arg pwd `pwd` '{ type: .helium.type, name: .name, description: .description, artifact: $pwd, license: .license, icon: .helium.icon}' package.json > dita-trajectory-visualization.json
